display_long_description:
Relaxing Fun with Hand Simulator Mini Games!

Immerse yourself in the collection of mini-games, taking full advantage of hand tracking and passthrough technology. Explore a world where your real hands become the star of the experience, blending physical interactions with the magic of VR. Whether you’re unwinding after a long day or looking for a unique way to enjoy your time, Hand Simulator Mini Games offers something for everyone.

Key Features:

Engaging Mini-Games!
Enjoy five unique mini-games, with more being added regularly! Test your reflexes with a block-stacking puzzle game, slice through flying objects in a fruit-slicing challenge, cast spells with a magic wand, topple virtual dominoes, become a basketball champ in your room, or unleash your creativity with painting pens. All games are designed to be relaxing and fun.

Passthrough Supported!
Interact with virtual objects seamlessly integrated into your real-world surroundings.

Relaxing and Accessible!
Designed for easy and stress-free gameplay, perfect for casual players or VR newcomers.

Real Hand Interaction!
Feel the joy of directly touching and manipulating objects, bringing a new level of immersion to VR gaming.

Enjoy a variety of mini-games that keep things fresh and exciting, with more added over time.

Experience the unique blend of VR and reality with passthrough and hand tracking.

No controllers required – play effortlessly using just your hands.

Perfect for anyone seeking lighthearted, relaxing, and innovative gameplay.
